revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

{{Taxobox | image = Geastrum corollinum...jpg | image_caption = | image_width = 234px | regnum = [[Fungi]] | divisio = [[Basidiomycota]] | classis = [[Agaricomycetes]] | ordo = [[Geastrales]] | familia = [[Geastraceae]] | genus = ''[[Geastrum]]'' | species = '''''G. corollinum''''' | binomial = ''Geastrum corollinum'' | binomial_authority = ([[Batsch]]) [[László Hollós|Hollós]] (1904) | synonyms_ref = | synonyms = ''Lycoperdon corollinum'' Batsch (1783)
''Lycoperdon recolligens'' [[With.]] (1792)
''Geastrum recolligens'' (With.) Desvaux (1809)
''Geastrum mammosum'' [[Chevall.]] (1826) }} {{mycomorphbox | name = ''Geastrum corollinum'' | capShape =no | hymeniumType=gleba | ecologicalType=saprotrophic | sporePrintColor=brown | howEdible=inedible }} '''''Geastrum corollinum''''' is an inedible species of [[mushroom]] belonging to the genus ''[[Geastrum]]'', or earthstar fungi. First [[species description|described]] scientifically by German naturalist [[August Johann Georg Karl Batsch]] in 1792 as ''Lycoperdon corollinum'', it was transferred to the genus ''[[Geastrum]]'' by [[László Hollós]] in 1904. ==References== {{Reflist|refs= {{cite book |author=Batsch AJGK. |title=Elenchus fungorum |page=151 |language=Latin}} {{cite book |author=Hollós L. |title=Die Gasteromyceten Ungarns |year=1904 |page=154 |language=German}} {{cite web |title=''Geastrum corollinum'' (Batsch) Hollós 1904 |url=http://www.mycobank.org/MycoTaxo.aspx?Link=T&Rec=118893 |publisher=[[MycoBank]]. International Mycological Association |accessdate=2012-02-10}} }} {{Taxonbar|from=Q5223613}} [[Category:Geastrum|corollinum]] [[Category:Fungi of Europe]] [[Category:Inedible fungi]] [[Category:Taxa named by August Batsch]] [[Category:Fungi described in 1792]] {{Geastrales-stub}}
